features: 😏UNBREAKcable Screen Protector for iPhone 14/13/13 Pro (Please note: this tempered glass is NOT suitable for iPhone 14 Pro).

👍【Perfect Fit for iPhone 14/13/13 Pro】2-Pack ultra-clarity screen protector tempered glass is exclusively designed for Apple iPhone 13/13 Pro/14 -6.1 inches. Kindly Remind: [iPhone 13/13 Pro/14 screen protector is to be slightly smaller than the display screen, it is an open-edge design] So the screen protector won't interfere with the front camera function or Face ID, which allows your phone to fit most of the phone case and prevents bubbling and peeling around the edges.

💎【Double Defence Shatterproof Protection】UNBREAKcable iPhone 13/13 Pro Screen Protector/iPhone 14 Screen Protector is made with reinforced technology. It resists scratches up to 9H hardness which is as twice as stronger as the original tempered screen protector and effectively protects your precious iPhone 13/13 Pro/iPhone 14 from unwanted scuffs and scratches that could be made by knives, keys, and some other hard substances in your pocket.

🤳【 Ultra Thin& Ultra HD】 This iPhone 13/13 Pro/iPhone 14 screen protector tempered glass is Hard but ultra-thin. The thickness is only 0.01 inches so you can enjoy the completely Bare Screen Experience. 99.9% high-density glass material brings paramount clarity improvement and highly restores the best visual feast brought by the iPhone screen. Wake up iPhone just needs 0.01s. Bring you the most natural iPhone viewing and 3D sensitive touch.

🎊【Bubble-free& Anti-fingerprint】Plasma spray and Auto-adsorption technology make the tempered glass able to self-expel air bubbles and keep fingerprints and smudges away for a clear view. Our glass protector for iPhone 14 / iPhone 13 Pro / iPhone 13 is coated with hydrophobic and oleo-phobic clear layers, hence, preventing permanent stains of oil residue from fingerprints even from long-term use.

💗【Easy Installation Frame】UNBREAKcable Screen Protector equipped with automatic alignment installation frame. It can be easy to install with the help of free package accessories. You can successfully install this screen protector in several seconds, even with no previous experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UNBREAKcable 9H Hardness Double Reinforced Tempered Glass Screen for Protecting your iPhone Warm Reminder: ONLY Designed for iPhone 14 / iPhone 13 / iPhone 13 Pro 6.1 inch. Please confirm your phone model before you purchase. What are the features? Super Easy Installation, 9H Hardness, Shatterproof, Automatically Bonding, Bubble-Free, Shockproof, Anti-Scratches, Anti-Fingerprints, HD(99.99% transparency), 3D Touch Support, Case-Friendly, etc. These features make the UNBREAKcable screen protector the best shield for your iPhone 14 / iPhone 13 Pro / iPhone 13 screen. Q1. How drop-resistant are our UNBREAKcable iPhone 14/13/13 Pro screen protector? Every single piece of the UNBREAKcable iPhone 14 screen protector/ iPhone 13 screen protector/ iPhone 13 Pro screen protector has passed a 9H pencil test and a 10.4 kg / 23 lbs pressure test. As a result, this tempered glass screen protector keeps your display intact and flawless daily, preventing any scratches, scrapes or cracks. Q2. What is the specialty of this screen protector compared with much cheaper ones? Our screen protector made with superior 9H tempered glass is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced ​to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market. 10s Super-easy Installed Auto Alignment Kit makes your installation easier than ever. This screen protector utilizes automatic adsorption technology to ensure that no bubbles can exist during the installation process. Q3: How can I get rid of bubbles? Please clean the screen before installing. If there are still unwanted bubbles after installing: For big bubbles: Slowly lift one corner of the screen protector to eliminate them, then re-position the protector in place.For tiny bubbles: Use the lint-free cloth provided to gently smooth them toward the closest edge of the glass protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a wonderful job
reviews.reviewText: This product works very well and being able to carry it protecting my phone and the protective pockets for carrying drivers license and cash and credit cards make it very handy and helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED - First one cracked quickly but replacement worked perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Original review is below. The company pretty quickly sent me a replacement. Once again it was super easy to install and has been on for over a week now, which included a drop or two, and still looks great. I’m not sure what was wrong with the first one I had but it seems like a fluke.I put this on Friday and Saturday morning I noticed a spiderweb of cracks. I didn’t drop my phone or bang anything on it, not entirely sure what caused it. It was the easiest screen protector I’ve ever put on which is why I went with two stars instead of one, I just wish it had lasted more than a day before cracking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit my phone, no air gaps
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed to protect my phone. Smooth application👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price, looks like it will work well.
reviews.reviewText: Came on time. Fairly easy to install and looks like it will be durable. Kits included were adequate for the installation. The only issue was the lint free cloth. I actually seemed to attract lint and made it hard to get all the little lint particles out from under the screen. Had to just the sticky paper to finish the install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfectly. Got 2 just in case I screwed one up!
reviews.reviewText: I dropped my phone so much It broke the protective cover.So I ordered a Otter case and took off the old protective cover and my screen was fine. It was just the protective cover that was broken!

reviews.reviewText: So impressed!!! Absolutely exceeds my expectations… it is the best screen protector I have ever had!! They even give you an extra one in case you need it… I am so happy with this product!!! 5 stars!!!!

reviews.reviewText: Nice screen protector, sure that it’ll do the job. Comes with all you need to apply. Instructions are easy to follow too.

Lo recomiendo es muy facil de instalar y se ve de buena calidad
